getting_started_text: Connect your wallet to start opening Vaults
create_account_text: The Vault Facilitator contract enables sending multiple transactions at once. It is the same DSProxy used by Maker and Balancer.
create_safe_text: Your Vault Facilitator contract was deployed! Now you can deposit collateral and borrow {{coin_ticker}} using a Vault.
uniswap_deposit_check_text: I want to directly deposit LP tokens and mine
uniswap_withdraw_check_text: I want to receive Uniswap LP tokens instead of OD and ETH
confirm_details_text: Please review and click on the Confirm Transaction button to submit and sign the transaction
wrong_network: Heads up, you’re on the wrong network! Please switch to
connect_text: Connect an Ethereum wallet to manage your {{coin_ticker}} positions
error_try_refresh: Error connecting. Try refreshing the page.
confirmations_info: You need to wait for 10 block confirmations to make sure that your account address does not change.
annual_redemption_tip: Rate at which OD is devalued or revalued over 1 year.
liquidation_price_tip: Collateral price under which this Vault can get liquidated. The liquidation price varies with the redemption price.
liquidation_penalty_tip: Liquidations ask for more OD than you have minted in your Vault, and apply a discount on the latest oracle price in order to incentivize bidding.
fullyUnlocked: You can claim all your ODG rewards right after you earn them.
proxy_wallet_text: Your wallet is connected! Now, let's create your Account
shutdown_text: The global settlement procedure was triggered for this system. You can't manage your Vaults from this application anymore.
redemption_price_tip: The 'moving peg' that the OD market price should return to
collateral_ratio_tip: The ratio between the value of the collateral and the value of debt in your Vault
debt_auction_minting_flx_desc: Debt auctions are meant to mint and auction new ODG in exchange for OD. The OD that is received by an auction will be used to eliminate bad (or otherwise called uncovered) debt from the system.
debt_auction_how_to_bid_desc: During a debt auction, you will bid a fixed amount of OD for a decreasing amount of ODG. A practical example: if the current ODG bid is 100 for 20K OD (resulting in a price of 200 OD/ODG), the next bid must accept less ODG for the same amount of OD. The auction also makes sure that each bid must be at least a certain percentage smaller than the previous one (e.g the next bid must be at least 3% smaller).
debt_auction_claim_tokens: What does the Claim Tokens button do?
debt_auction_claim_tokens_desc: In case someone outbids you in a debt auction, your OD bid will be reimbursed to your Open Dollar Account.Claim Tokens can be used to get back OD (and ODG) that is kept in your Account.
collateral_auction_increasing_discount_d: In order to incentivize bidding, collaterals are sold at a discount in comparison with the market price. The discount increases with time, until the discount deadline timestamp, where discount will have arrived to a maximum value.
collateral_auction_settlement_desc: Collateral auctions don't have a deadline, they will remain open until either all collateral was sold, or all required OD was raised, in which case the auction will be closed and the remaining collateral will be returned to the Vault owner.
collateral_auction_minting_flx_desc: Collateral auctions are meant to sell collateral that was seized from a Vault in exchange for OD. The OD that is received by an auction will be burned.
surplus_auction_minting_flx_desc: Surplus auctions are meant to sell OD that has accrued inside the protocol in exchange for ODG. The ODG that is received by an auction will be burned.
surplus_auction_how_to_bid_desc: During a surplus auction, you will bid an increasing amount of ODG for a fixed amount of OD. A practical example: if the current ODG bid is 100 for 20K OD (resulting in a price of 200 OD/ODG), the next bidder must bid more ODG for the same amount of OD. The auction also makes sure that each bid must be at least a certain percentage higher than the previous one (e.g the next bid must be at least 3% higher).
surplus_auction_claim_tokens: What does the Claim Tokens button do?
surplus_auction_claim_tokens_desc: In case someone outbids you in a surplus auction, your ODG bid will be reimbursed to your Open Dollar Account. Claim Tokens can be used to get back ODG (and OD) that is kept in your Account.
managed_safe_warning: CAUTION: You are not the owner of this Vault. You can only deposit collateral or repay debt. Note that these operations are irreversible.
liquidate_safe_warning: CAUTION: You are about to start the liquidation of this Vault. Note that this operation is irreversible.
liquidate_confirmation: I understand that I am about to liquidate this Vault.
eth_next_osm_tip: Next collateral price that will be used by the system. This price is updated once per hour
eth_osm_tip: Current collateral price used by the system. This price is delayed 1h from the live collateral price feed and it’s only updated once per hour
debt_owed_tip: Total amount of OD that is owed by this vault
collateral_deposited_tip: Total amount of collateral that is deposited in this vault
stability_fee_tip: It is the annual interest rate paid by Vault owners on their debt. Proceeds from the borrow rate go to the protocol’s balance sheet
hai_red_price_tip: OD’s “moving peg”. It’s the price at which OD is minted or repaid inside the protocol. The OD market price is expected to fluctuate around the redemption price
moneygod_desc: The Money God League is an initiative to help other teams launch their own OD like assets and share a stake in each of their protocols with the Open Dollar community. You can stake ODG or ODG/ETH Uniswap v2 LP tokens and receive (un)governance tokens in League participants.
sanctioned_wallet: This wallet is not allowed to connect
geoblocked_wallet: We're sorry but your country is not currently supported
deposit_funds_warning: When protocol is live this deposit will be converted into OD vault and mint 1 OD.
